title: Betfair23
author: Betfair23
content: Hello I exchange USDt for your PayPal starting from minum 25$ the rate depend on quantity you can add me to telegram in my profile or send me a pm here thanks

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Do you accept escrow and what rate would you charge for 1718 USD?
